Room.Name: Main Street/Waterfront Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Waterfront Way and Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street is one of the larger streets in Oceancrest, which will eventually bring you into the center of town. To the south, you can make out the City Walls and the Southern Entrance to the city, about a block away. Waterfront Way travels east to west. East on Waterfront brings you towards the farmlands and graineries of town. West on Waterfront leads into more shopping centers and towards the eastern city wall.
